author: niallp
msg: LANG-272 Remove 2.1 build target and exclusion of "text" package from source distro.

author: cam
msg: 1. Animation priority is fixed now, so that begin times affect animation
priority, and if begin times are equal, the document order is used.
2. Animations can now be removed and added to the document any time
3. An implicit unresolved end time is now used when the end timing specifier
list contains eventbase, accesskey or repeat timing specifiers.

author: psteitz
msg: Don't attempt jar deployment unless build has succeeded.

author: chirino
msg: Updated pom so that it has the proper contents now.
